import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import"./styles/ContactsPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactsPage=()=>{const mapRef=useRef(null);const mapInitialized=useRef(false);let mapInstance=null;useEffect(()=>{const loadMapScript=()=>{const script=document.createElement("script");script.src="https://api-maps.yandex.ru/2.1/?lang=ru_RU&apikey=ВАШ_API_КЛЮЧ";script.async=true;script.onload=()=>{window.ymaps.ready(()=>{if(!mapInitialized.current){mapInstance=new window.ymaps.Map("map",{center:[56.794256,60.646841],zoom:17});const placemark=new window.ymaps.Placemark([56.794256,60.646841],{balloonContent:"г.
